metadata.dc:author: Cortés Vizcaino, C
Corella Piquer, M D
Giménez Fernández, F J
Calatayud Sarthou, A
Talamante Serrulla, S
metadata.dc:description: The study describes the mortality (1951-1986) and morbidity (1977-1988) from appendicitis in Spain. Mortality decreased steadily throughout the study period; it was higher in men and in the elderly, both men and women. Hospital morbidity from appendicitis decreased by 40% from 1977 to 1988; this decrease was more pronounced in elderly patients; morbidity was higher in patients 15 to 24 years old. Possible causes of this evolution in morbidity are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Mortalidad (1951-1986) y morbilidad (1977-1988) por apendicitis en España.
[Mortality (1951-1986) and morbidity (1977-1988) from appendicitis in Spain].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
